document_data.name: Acid Storm
document_data.mainbody: '''''Acid storm''''' was a spell that caused acid to rain down in an area 20 feet (6 meters) in diameter.
document_data.Components: The material component of this spell was a flask of [[acid]].
document_data.Crafting: This spell was one of several that could be used in the creation of ''[[acidic burst]]'' weapons.
document_data.History: ''Acid storm'' was created by the [[Red Wizard]]s, who called it '''''acid rain'''''. By [[1372 DR]], the spell was known throughout the [[Realms]].
